hotel_manager.title: HOTEL MANAGEMENT AND OPERATION CONSULTING
hotel_manager.description: Operating a hotel, resort, or serviced apartment requires not only a deep understanding of the market but also a team of experts to optimize operations and profitability. A professional management company helps investors minimize risks, save time and costs through well-structured strategies, standardized processes, and innovative solutions. Moreover, they establish connections with major partners, tap into sustainable guest sources, and ensure exceptional guest experiences, elevating your brand value and property assets to new heights.
hotel_manager.text_1: Vibel International – Comprehensive Hotel Management and Operation Solutions
hotel_manager.text_2: Vibel International partners with investors from the very beginning, providing optimized solutions to enhance operational efficiency and reduce costs. We analyze local market conditions, advise on suitable hotel scale, establish short-term and long-term development strategies, and build sustainable competitive advantages.
hotel_manager.text_3: With a team of top architects and experts, we offer functional design consultation tailored to each project's needs. Our experienced management team, well-versed in Vietnamese culture and market dynamics, ensures efficient hotel operations and delivers exceptional hospitality experiences.
hotel_manager.text_4: We collaborate closely with leading corporations and strategic guest sourcing partners to maximize revenue and achieve ultimate customer satisfaction. Vibel International is committed to being a trusted partner, helping investors optimize profitability and enhance the long-term value of their assets.

hotel_franchise_consulting.title: HOTEL FRANCHISE CONSULTING
hotel_franchise_consulting.description: Franchise Solutions – The optimal choice for Investors. Vibel International partners with investors to select and implement franchise agreements with leading global hotel groups such as Wyndham, Accor, Marriott, and IHG... We offer tailored franchise models, from operational management to comprehensive business solutions, to optimize profitability, elevate brand value, and ensure sustainable success for your project.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_1: Vibel International – Your Strategic Partner in Hotel Franchise Consulting
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_2: Vibel International conducts in-depth research and analysis of local markets for hotels, resorts, and serviced apartments using tools such as “FS,” “SWOT,” “P&L,” “SMART,” and “Projection.” We provide guidance on determining appropriate project scale, management strategies, and short- and long-term development plans to enhance the competitive edge of each project.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_3: Currently, Vibel International is the official representative of Wyndham Hotel Group (WHG) in Vietnam and collaborates closely with leading global hospitality brands such as Accor, Marriott, IHG, and others to offer franchise and hotel management services for properties across Vietnam.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_4: We offer two primary franchise models:
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_5: Management Franchise: Combining operational support with comprehensive management.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_6: Full Business Format Franchise: Delivering holistic solutions, from business strategy to operations.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_7: With a team of seasoned experts and a global network of partners, Vibel International is committed to providing effective solutions, enhancing brand value, and optimizing profitability for investors.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_9: Use and legally own a strong, reputable brand, a big brand in the top 5 strongest brands in the world for the project in business development.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_10: Receive architectural and design advice for projects according to corporate standards.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_11: Before opening, the project's human resources system will be professionally trained and educated by experts.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_12: The project will be activated within the group's sales and marketing system and network (with more than 800 offices in different countries/territories).
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_13: The project (hotel/resort) will be regularly inspected and evaluated to ensure the maintenance of customer service quality, at least twice a year.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_14: Brand, commercial image and project name are regularly promoted and developed by the Group's communication and marketing system.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_15: The project is linked and connected with the Group's partners (such as airlines, tourism organizations, banking systems, cards, etc.) globally with more than 128 countries and territories.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_16: Use the brand and do business under that brand, with revenue within a certain period of time, ensuring compliance with the model, business methods, business processes, and system operating terms.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_17: The franchisor will transfer standards, plans, business models and support in promoting and communicating the project.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_18: Management service after receiving the franchise (Optional)
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_19: Project management, shouldering all the investor's worries in maintenance and business for the hotel according to international standards and regulations.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_20: The human resources system is regularly trained and educated in the most professional and updated way for the hotel.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_21: Establish and build business plans, strategies and systems for the project to bring the best revenue to the investor.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_23: The contract term is short term, minimum 10 years, if the investor does not want to extend it further.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_24: Brand fee is paid only once, no additional payment required if contract is renewed
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_25: Big brand, strong brand, in the top 5, strong brands in the world.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_26: The business, marketing and sales system is very large with more than 800 offices/systems/business and promotion networks located in 128 countries and territories.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_27: Your project has a large customer base of corporate regulars, members (along with over 80 million corporate customers)
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_28: The transfer costs must meet all requirements and capabilities of the investor.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_29: Our brands are members of associations and tourism exhibition organizations around the world, accordingly, the products and projects of the investors are often present or appear in World Tourism programs.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_30: Since the project is a member of the brand, the project naturally benefits from the internal sales system (cross-selling/cross-profiting from hotels within the system).
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_31: High communication and professional marketing support will easily access the customer system as well as the group's communication system to save marketing costs for the project.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_32: The investor is provided with the entire process, management standards, procedures, finance, training, and staff management.
hotel_franchise_consulting.text_33: There is no potential risk when VIBEL INT commits to the investor to only pay the fee after using the service.

explore_hotel_brands.title: EXPLORE HOTEL BRANDS
explore_hotel_brands.description: At Vibel International, we have established strong partnerships with the world's leading hotel groups, including Wyndham, Accor, Marriott, IHG, and many others. This extensive network allows us to offer a wide range of premium hotel brands, giving investors access to top-tier options tailored to their unique project needs. With our deep industry connections and expertise, we guide you in selecting the most suitable brand to elevate your project, ensuring long-term success and growth. Explore the diverse portfolio of hotel brands we represent and find the perfect match for your investment.

develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.title: Development Consulting and Project Supervision
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.description: Vibel International's Hotel Project Development and Supervision Consulting service helps investors optimize costs, ensure project timelines and quality, while achieving high return on investment (ROI). We provide comprehensive solutions, from selecting the right brand and overseeing construction to managing safety factors and addressing any issues that arise during implementation. With a team of experienced experts, Vibel International is committed to providing long-term strategies, ensuring sustainable project growth, and enhancing the value and profitability of your investment.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_1: Vibel International provides comprehensive consulting services for investors in the development and construction phases of hotel projects, covering investment strategy, funding, construction timelines, and quality control. We support investors through the following specific services:
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_2: Brand Selection Consulting: Assisting in the selection of reputable hotel and resort brands that align with the project's vision and development potential.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_3: Architectural and Design Firm Selection: Helping choose professional firms for architectural and interior design to ensure aesthetic value and functionality.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_4: Construction Supervision: Monitoring the construction progress to ensure the project is completed on time and meets quality requirements.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_5: Investment Cost Management: Controlling the budget, optimizing costs, and helping investors achieve the highest return on investment (ROI).
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_6: Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing System Design Consulting: Ensuring that mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems comply with international standards and operational requirements.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_7: Partnership Connection and Collaboration: Assisting investors in connecting and collaborating with contractors, brand franchisors, and hotel management companies for efficient project implementation.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_8: Design and Construction Change Evaluation: Ensuring that any changes to the design and construction do not affect the timeline, quality, safety, or environmental standards.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_9: Workplace Safety and Environmental Supervision: Ensuring compliance with safety, environmental, and fire prevention regulations during construction.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_10: Project Risk Management: Managing risks associated with the project, ensuring potential issues are forecasted and addressed promptly.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_12: Strategic and Project Goal Consulting: We listen carefully to understand the project’s goals and business needs, aiming to maximize business efficiency and ensure sustainable success.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_13: Capital Cost Optimization: We work closely with investors to optimize the investment budget, ensuring the highest ROI and effective capital utilization.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_14: Multidisciplinary Approach: Our teams use data-driven analysis to provide future strategies, guiding investors in hotel management and operations decisions, while optimizing investment profits.
develop_consulting_and_project_supervisi.text_15: With a team of experienced experts and scientific management methods, Vibel International is committed to partnering with investors to implement internationally standardized, efficient, and sustainable hotel projects.

about_us.title: ABOUT US
about_us.description: Vibel International - A strategic partner in franchise consulting, design, operation, and management of hotels and resorts in Vietnam, dedicated to elevating property value and maximizing profitability for investors.
about_us.text_1: Vibel International was founded by experienced professionals in the field of development and operation of hotel and resort systems from various countries. Vibel International provides consultancy services for obtaining "brand franchising" (Franchise Service) from international hotel corporations. The company also offers design and operational consultancy services for hotel projects and investors in Vietnam.
about_us.text_2: These services include project feasibility analysis and assessment, planning and technical services, owner representation to oversee contractor activities, and handling local legal issues. Vibel International further assists investors in recruiting senior personnel, establishing business and marketing systems, communication frameworks, customer care systems, and supplier networks before project inauguration.
about_us.text_3: Following this, Vibel International takes on the responsibility of managing (Management Service) hotel and resort projects, working closely with the channels and systems of international corporations to optimize operations and business activities. This ensures increased revenue and cost savings while alleviating all concerns for the investors.
about_us.text_4: PRINCIPLES AND PHILOSOPHY OF VIBEL INTERNATIONAL
about_us.text_5: Always deliver the best service quality to customers and partners with integrity, a cooperative attitude, and the highest level of efficiency in work.
about_us.text_6: Commit to complying with laws, policies, and regulations of the State, upholding trustworthiness, and avoiding deceit for profit.
about_us.text_7: Responsibility: Ensure customer satisfaction and partner success. Provide benefits for employees and contribute to societal development.
about_us.text_8: Guarantee peace of mind for customers and partners by prioritizing business ethics to ensure absolute safety in sustainable and long-term development.
about_us.text_9: Commit to safety and environmentally friendly development, promoting a "green, clean, and beautiful" environment.
about_us.text_10: Aim to leverage “smart” technology and Industry 4.0 innovations to minimize operational costs and protect the shared environment.

representative.title: Representative of Wyndham Hotel Group in Vietnam
representative.text_1: THE ROLE OF VIBEL INT WITH WYNDHAM
representative.text_2: VIBEL INT (“VIBEL INTERNATIONAL”) was established in 2008 in Vietnam to collaborate and connect with WHG (“Wyndham Hotel Group”) in the United States, supporting and developing hotel and resort projects for investors in Vietnam.
representative.text_3: WHG is ranked among the top 5 hotel groups in the world. As of 2024, VIBEL INT has successfully connected and facilitated transactions for over 40 projects under WHG’s brands.
representative.text_4: VIBEL INT has excelled in explaining and persuading investors to understand and leverage the advantages and strengths of partnering with WHG, specifically:
representative.text_5: Benefits for Investors in Franchise Partnerships:
representative.text_6: Investors gain legal ownership of a prestigious global brand ranked among the top 5 hotel and resort management groups in the world.
representative.text_7: Projects receive architectural and design consultancy services adhering to Wyndham’s standards.
representative.text_8: Hotel or resort staff are professionally trained by Wyndham’s experts.
representative.text_9: Investor projects are integrated into Wyndham's global business and marketing network with over 1,000 offices across different countries and territories. Hotel and resort images and names are regularly promoted through Wyndham’s magazines and media.
representative.text_10: Wyndham regularly inspects and evaluates the quality of hotels or resorts to ensure the best service standards for guests.
representative.text_11: Investor hotels and resorts are linked with Wyndham’s extensive partner network, including airlines, travel agencies, banking systems, credit card providers, and more, across over 128 countries and territories.
representative.text_12: When Wyndham is requested by investors to manage their hotels, the group:
representative.text_13: Wyndham assumes responsibility for business operations and marketing to maximize revenue for the hotel or resort.
representative.text_14: Wyndham guarantees that services at the hotel or resort consistently meet international standards.
representative.text_15: The group provides continuous training for hotel or resort staff.
representative.text_16: Wyndham establishes comprehensive sales systems and networks.
representative.text_17: Ensures proper maintenance of hotel or resort facilities in accordance with Wyndham’s standards.
representative.text_19: Minimum contract duration of 10 years, with an optional 10-year extension without requiring an additional joining fee if desired by the investor.
representative.text_20: Wyndham does not mandate direct management of hotels if the investor does not require it.
representative.text_21: Fees are only charged after the contract comes into effect.
representative.text_22: Wyndham boasts a vast global sales and marketing network with over 800 offices in 128 countries and territories.
representative.text_23: Hotels and resorts under Wyndham’s management benefit from a loyal customer base of over 80 million members of Wyndham’s global loyalty program.
representative.text_24: Fee structures are tailored to meet the financial capacities of investors.
representative.text_25: Investor hotels and resorts are consistently featured across Wyndham’s marketing and media platforms.
representative.text_26: All guests staying at Wyndham-branded properties are invited to join Wyndham’s loyalty program, earning points for future stays at Wyndham locations worldwide.
